QuestData.Title: WANTED: Tempest-Forge Destroyers
QuestData.Description: There are mechanical constructs within the Mechanar which Mah'duun has been told must be dismantled.$B$BGo to Tempest Keep, find the tempest-forge destroyers and destroy them.$B$BThen you may return to collect the bounty.
QuestData.LogDescription: Nether-Stalker Mah'duun wants you to destroy 5 Tempest-Forge Destroyers. Return to him in Shattrath's Lower City once they all lie dead in order to collect the bounty.
QuestData.CompletionText: <The nether-stalker cocks his head in apparent confusion at your presence.>$B$BThe destroyers have not all been destroyed.
QuestData.RewardText: Mah'duun enjoys fighting constructs; they are less messy than organic beings.$B$BThe bounty is yours.$B$BReturn again tomorrow and the winds will have whispered once more to Mah'duun.
